item.title: Accor plans to introduce the ibis Styles brand to Singapore later this year
item.description:
Source: Accor. The ibis Style in the Macpherson area, Singapore, will be launched this year. Accor plans to open an ibis Styles hotel in Singapore by the last quarter of 2015, introducing a trendy, lifestyle-focused brand to the country. Situated within the same complex as the MacPherson shopping mall, the hotel is conveniently located at the intersection of MacPherson and Aljunied Roads, a short 20-minute drive from the airport...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accor-plans-to-introduce-the-ibis-styles-brand-to-singapore-later-this-year/
